instructions.title: Color Perception Test
instructions.description: In this test, you'll be shown a grid of colors. Your task is to identify the color that appears most different from the others.

steps.1: Look at the grid of colors carefully
steps.2: Identify the color that stands out the most
steps.3: Click on the color you think is different
steps.4: You'll have multiple rounds to test your perception

instructions.studyDescription: Different color models (RGB, CIELAB, Oklab, CIECAM02-UCS) represent colors in various ways. We're collecting data to understand which models best match human color perception.
instructions.privacyDescription: Your data is collected anonymously. We only store your responses, timing, and basic device information. No personal information is collected.

gameOver.title: Test Complete!
gameOver.shareText: I completed level {{level}} with a score of {{score}} in {{time}}! Try it yourself!
gameOver.thankYou: Thank you for participating in our color perception study! Your anonymous data helps us understand human color perception better.

board.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

messages.1: Developer tools detected! Please close them and refresh the page to continue.
messages.2: Please don't try to cheat! This experiment requires your honest participation

leaderboard.error: Failed to load leaderboard data. Please try again later.

colorModels.title: Color Model Performance
colorModels.description: shows how well each color model performs in identifying colors

colorFamilies.title: Color Family Performance
colorFamilies.description: shows how well different color families are identified

users.title: Top Users
users.description: ranks players based on their performance and achievements

sessions.title: Recent Sessions
sessions.description: shows the latest gameplay sessions from all players
